ComicInfo.Summary:
The new Batman (Azrael) guest-stars as he joins the Chain Gang's battle with the Crooked Man. Meanwhile, carnage ensues at the House of Correction as Curtis imposes his brutal sentence.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/chain-gang-war-11-knightshift/4000-107311/
ComicInfo.Title: The Crooked Man, Part 4: Knightshift
